title: Zesty turkey broth
ingredients: ['1 lemon', '15 g (½ oz) parsley', '1 litre (1¾ pints) chicken stock, preferably home-made', '2 carrots, cut into 1 cm (½ in) dice', '2 celery sticks, cut into 1 cm (½ in) dice', '225 g (8 oz) skinless turkey breast steaks, cut into 1 x 4 cm (½ x 1½ in) strips', '100 g (3½ oz) small broccoli florets', 'salt and pepper']
